Installation Process

Expert InstallationGuaranteed Results

Our skilled technicians follow a proven installation process that ensures perfect bonding, optimal drainage, and long-lasting beauty. Every project is completed to the highest standards with attention to detail.

1

Surface Preparation

Professional cleaning and priming of the base surface

2

Quartz Stone Mixing

Precise blending of premium aggregates with high-grade Quartz stones

3

Expert Application

Seamless installation ensuring perfect finish and drainage

Why Choose Drenopav?

Unmatched Benefits forNigerian Conditions

Our Drenopav permeable floor surfaces are specifically designed to excel in Nigeria's demanding climate, offering superior performance, longevity, and aesthetic appeal.

Permeable & Flood-Resistant

Advanced drainage system prevents waterlogging and flooding, making it ideal for Nigeria's climate.

Ultra-Strong (5+ Tons)

Supports heavy vehicles including trucks and SUVs without cracking or damage.

Easy to Clean & Maintain

Simple pressure washing keeps your surface looking pristine year after year.

UV-Stable Colors

Fade-resistant technology ensures your surface maintains its beauty under intense sun.

Eco-Friendly Choice

Supports sustainable urban drainage systems (SuDS) and reduces environmental impact.

Luxurious Finish

Premium aesthetic that enhances property value and creates stunning visual appeal.

Heavy-Duty Performance

Perfect for commercial applications including car parks, loading areas, and high-traffic zones.

Long-Lasting Durability

20+ year lifespan with minimal maintenance requirements and excellent return on investment.

Sustainability

Contributing to Nigeria's Environmental Future

Our Drenopav permeable floor surfaces support sustainable urban drainage systems (SuDS), helping prevent flooding and reducing urban heat island effects. Choose Drenopav for a greener, more resilient Nigeria.

Reduces Surface Runoff
Carbon Neutral Production

About Drenopav

Nigeria's Trusted Leader inQuartz Stone Flooring

For over 3 years, Drenopav has been transforming Nigeria's landscape with premium Drenopav permeable floor surfaces, setting the standard for quality and innovation.

Pioneering SustainableFlooring Solutions

Founded with a vision to bring world-class Quartz stone technology to Nigeria, Drenopav has grown from a small specialist contractor to the country's leading provider of permeable surface solutions.

Our commitment to excellence has made us the preferred choice for luxury residential projects, commercial developments, and infrastructure initiatives across all 36 states of Nigeria.

As part of Duruco Concept Limited, we combine technical expertise with innovative thinking to deliver surfaces that are not just beautiful, but environmentally responsible and built to last.

Why Choose Drenopav?

Excellence

We deliver nothing but the highest quality Drenopav permeable floor surfaces, exceeding industry standards.

Reliability

Trusted by hundreds of clients across Nigeria for consistent, dependable results.

Innovation

Leading the industry with cutting-edge techniques and sustainable solutions.

Customer First

Your satisfaction is our priority, from consultation to project completion.
